Detailed Description

Implementation of shiftBoard for a six channel high current Arduino shield.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

shiftSix::shiftSix ( uint8_t  devCount,
shiftDevice **  devices 
)

Create a new shiftSix board object.

Parameters:
devCountThe number of individual devices attached to this board.
**devicesAn array of pointers to the device objects. This array and the objects it contains must be allocated either statically or at global scope.

Member Function Documentation

void shiftSix::doBoardTick ( uint8_t  chainSize,
uint8_t  firstByte,
uint8_t *  chainBytes 
) [virtual]

Do a timer tick for a six channel board.

Parameters:
chainSizeThe number of bytes in the entire daisy chain of boards
firstByteThe index of the first byte assigned to this board
*chainBytesThe array of bytes that will be shifted out to the chain.
